Tech.title: My Technologies
Tech.description: I’m exploring a variety of technologies that allow me to create complete, modern, and scalable solutions.

tech-stacks.react-dec: A declarative and efficient JavaScript library for building modern user interfaces, especially single-page applications (SPAs).
tech-stacks.next-dec: A React-based framework offering hybrid rendering (SSR/SSG), automatic routing, and great performance for scalable web apps.
tech-stacks.tailwind-dec: A utility-first CSS framework that lets you build responsive and modern layouts directly within your HTML.
tech-stacks.node-dec: A JavaScript runtime environment that enables server-side programming with high performance for APIs and back-end systems.
tech-stacks.express-dec: A minimalist and flexible framework for Node.js used to quickly and efficiently build web applications and APIs.
tech-stacks.type-dec: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, helping to prevent bugs and improve code maintainability.
tech-stacks.prisma-dec: A modern ORM for Node.js and TypeScript that simplifies database access and manipulation with safe typing.
tech-stacks.mysql-dec: A widely used relational database management system known for its performance, reliability, and ease of use.
tech-stacks.java-dec: An object-oriented, robust, and cross-platform programming language widely used in enterprise applications and Android development.
tech-stacks.python-dec: A versatile, simple, and powerful programming language, popular for automation, data analysis, web development, and AI.
